EmailTemplate.description: Includes 6 week survey link in SG3
EmailTemplate.name: 04 6 week survey Reminder 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to Share Your {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} I+N Experiences
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
A friendly reminder today to advise that this is your last chance to complete the online application example on how youâ€™ve been using your ENS skills. Remember, all responses will be reviewed by {!Contact.Job_Presenters__c} and feedback will be provided to the group along with everyone's (anonymous) examples.
Click here to access the survey. http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1120228/6-WEEK-POST-PROGRAM-SURVEY?jid={!Contact.Last_Job_ID__c}&pid={!Contact.Last_Participant_Id__c} The survey link is specific to you, please don't forward to others.
It would be appreciated if you could complete your response by: {!Contact.Job_6_week_case_study_due__c}.
We look forward to hearing about your negotiation experiences and to providing you with some more feedback.
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Client Service Manager
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
